name: Attack
description: Basic attack, deal damage equal to 100% of current attack

name: Blood Slash
description: Deal 1X attack attack damage, For every 10 max health, deal 1 extra damage

name: Goblin Slam
description: Deal 1.5X attack damage, 10% chance of applying "Skip turn" to enemy

name: Corrupt
description: Deal 2X attack damage to uncorrupted character
